title: Full Show (Steve Nash out as Nets coach, Cowboys almost traded for Brandin Cooks, Should Kyrie be suspended?)
description:
00:00 Nets and former HC Steve Nash agree to part ways
22:55 Cowboys almost traded for Brandin Cooks
52:28 KD reacts to Steve Nash leaving the Nets
1:09:27 Charles Barkley thinks Kyrie Irving should have been suspended for comments
1:20:57 Nets will reportedly hire Celtics HC Ime Udoka to lead their team
1:30:52 Micah Parsons is the runaway favorite to win DPOTY
1:40:22 Which NFL team walked away with the most impactful trade before the deadline?
1:47:31 Should the 3-5 Warriors be worried after loss to Heat?
1:53:26 Lakers are home underdogs vs Pelicans tonight. Who wins?
